mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_cooler(cooler_name, cooler_company, cooler_type, cooler_regdate, cooler_price, cooler_iamge) VALUES(#{cooler_name},#{cooler_company},#{cooler_type},now(),#{cooler_price},#{cooler_image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM p_cooler WHERE cooler_status=0) p_cooler WHERE cooler_type like CONCAT('%', #{cooler_type}) ORDER BY cooler_type,cooler_price;
